title: [Locksmehr River, Rope Bridge]
description: Water sprays up into the air in all directions as it pounds the large boulders of the river below the bridge.  To the north, the river bends slightly as it comes down out of the mountains.  To the south it flows quickly around to the west towards Wehnimer's Landing.  The river has cut a wide swath through the lush forest, creating bluffs above the banks on either side of the rough rapids.
